items.sentence: Tom can't tell us who we can and can't talk to.
Tom bullied me when I was in elementary school.
I'm definitely interested in what Tom is doing.
I'd really like you to invite Tom to our party.
I wondered if Tom wanted to do that by himself.
I wondered if Tom needed to do that by himself.
I wonder why they picked Tom to be the manager.
I wonder what we should do if Tom doesn't come.
I wasn't allowed to tell Tom what was going on.
I live in Boston, not far from where Tom lives.
